mutants.code:
import numpy as np

def G(n):
    a_values = np.arange(3, n + 1)
    b_counts = (a_values - 1) / 2
    b_sums = b_counts * (b_counts + 1) / 2
    r_sums = a_values * b_counts / 2 - b_sums
    return np.sum(r_sums)

    r_sums = a_values * b_counts / 2 - b_sums
    return np.sum(r_sums)
